Title: Allows tenants to appeal judgments or orders issued against them without first being required to pay any portion of such judgment or order
Summary: Allows tenants to appeal judgments or orders issued against them without first being required to pay any portion of such judgment or order; postpones such payment until the end of the stay triggered by service upon the landlord of the notice of appeal or affidavit of intention to move for permission to appeal such judgment or order or pay an undertaking.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to allowing tenants to appeal judgments or orders issued against them without first being required to pay any portion of such judgment or order
